About me

Hi, I'm Ephraim - Front-End Developer 
based in Bat Yam, Israel.
As long as I can remember, I've always liked to simplify and automate all the processes around me. Bring them to a minimalistic look in which every detail is in its place. By chance, I got introduced to code at school, and understood how I can fully implement this skill. Since then, I've enjoyed writing code that is minimalistic, elegant and effective as possible.
I'm always focused on improving my skills as Front-End Developer. Looking forward to implement excellent projects with wonderful people.
